attributes.action: Referendum on the staying/ leaving the EU
attributes.additional_details: We want a say on wether WE want to be in the european union. As a net contributor, we pay billions of pounds a year and get a small amount of that back. The contribution is also rising so the cuts we make at home are canceled out by price we pay to be part of the EU and we are actually borrowing money to be part of the dictatorship where we are told we have to let europeans in our country and that prisoners should get the vote!
